ryad.games.ergoengine.components
Class ControllerComponent

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.GameComponent
      ryad.games.ergoengine.components.ControllerComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener
public abstract class ControllerComponent
extends GameComponent

Author:
Jason Welch Generic controller for "controlling" game objects. to do: add methods such as "moveTo" and also, use the objects acceleration vs the speed var. Also, add checks for min/max velocity. A collision response component may later need to alter the velocity/ position...but that all will be done before rendering...
